dialogue: Wonderful! I have your first job for you already. We need
to head to planet Regnum, where the Empire is sourced.
And from now on, please refer to me as Ms. Tequia.
Here's your downpayment. It should be satisfactory, yes?
Thank you for your help Toni. You'll receive
the payment, for this commission on E-pay.
Ah, no problem! Have a wonderful day.
